content: Best game

The controls really can screw you over....this is a much harder experience than on console but just as rewarding. I'm on the 5th stage and keep coming back for more. Also someone needs to fix the Achievements and Leaderboards...me they don't work.

Nice classic games, brings back old times. Too bad no controller support, kinda hard with touch screen controller. The game difficulty level is same as the old game. Do double jumps at Casual mode, thats new. Please update & fix it with controller support, then i'll give 5 stars.
Works best
Please give support for a controller - only gripe I have is that there is no controller support.

No controller support and awful screen controls. If the screen touchpad was good it would be fine, but everything is a separate button. Jump and climb should be the same, down should be on a d pad. I wish i could get a refund, but at least it is classic/true to original. 2 stars because it plays how i remember.
Great but also hard.

Its a shame, this is one of my old skool classics! Loved the game.. but it was no way this hard! I'm a gamer, but even i can't get passed the first stage!! If its only me then fine, 5 star because its a awesome classic. but if you agree with me, then man, easy up a little, this is crazy hard! I mean, I'm up for a bit of a challenge, but still want to enjoy it. Note to makers. Make it a little easier and job done x

content: F your game, ive gone and downloaded the roms and emulator. Much better.

If you played this on the Sega Megadrive this is a must buy. Controls are fine in my opinion as you can switch between different layouts. For some reason your magic attack always charges up automatically after everytime you use it which I find a bit annoying as a third button appears that obscures your view forward a bit, other than that I have no real complaints. Glad I bought it.
Great game, highly addictive and challenging.

Classic

Omg I was just a kid when I played this on Super Nintendo. The only person that could beat this game was my mom she was awesome at this game lol. Great memories. The controls are easy to get used too.
the game plays good but, you can't continue like you could on the SEGA. smaller buttons for jump, attack and magic would be nice.

The controls for this game are very bad and the game has no controller support which is completely unacceptable. Also the touchscreen controls are shown nearly opaque which obstructs much of your view. Classic mode is nearly impossible since it's game over if you die.
great game Nearly impossible with touch screen controls
impossible controls

This game is a classic and I love being able to play it on the phone. It plays better than expected. The graphics, the music and everything is as I remember bringing back both frustrating and great childhood memories alike. The controls can be a bit difficult to manage, but if you put any effort into it you'll find that it's still very playable

well the game itself works flawless, but the controls really sucks, actually really frustratingly bad. the game itself is hard as it is, and having controls that are easily miss pressed or for example the magic control that covers a big space in front of you. making you easily missed enemies spawning from the ground. I played max Payne recently, where you can move around the buttons, and decide which size you like on em. anyhow maybe phone controls aren't optimal for this type of game.
cant play with black screen. music working fine, but on screen render game is Black.
Great port of the Arcade Classic but the experience is hampered by a lack of Bluetooth control options.
Double-Jump stops working resulting in a reinstall to fix, losing all your data from Casual Mode.

I love this game. It's more difficult than most games, but more rewarding than most games. The touch screen controls are the only thing preventing 5 stars. Not much can help that though. This is a smart phone.

Just how i remember it but it's pretty difficult using the touch controls, is there support for a joypad? Last time i tried i could only jump and fire so useless. Need full support for me to enjoy it properly
needs gamepad support asap. please.

i love this game, have completed this on the mega drive and love replaying it again, this port is exactly the same and love its a real hard game, which comes to my problem, its a hard game and i am struggling to get to the 2nd level, thats not because of the game, thats because I have to look wherever my fingers press and you can't do that in this game you have to keep 100% of the time focusing on the game and thats why you need controller support for this game please do this and i will 5 star üåü
better than the other one. hasnt crashed yet. no difference between casual and classic.
Hell yeah good game kept my wife and I busy for 2 weeks

Fantastic port, the touch controls are actually very responsive and we'll designed. People who have given this game a low score probably just don't understand that old school arcade games are difficult and require lots of practice to master the gameplay.
I loved this game as a kid on the sega megadrive but it just won't work at all for me. Just a pink or blue screen and nothing else. Don't bother. This software is seriously flawed.

I'm sure the gameplay & graphics are great considering how much I like the NES game but this port is horrible at least on my device. The level starts and you can hear the SFX and see 1 or 2 sprites but the rest of the screen and platforms are just a yellow neon screen for me. It's sucks because I don't normally pay for titles on Mobile but since it's a classic game from Capcom i thought it'd be safe...

Please, add full screen and controller support. 5 star game. Hope to see Ultimate Ghosts & Goblins. And other arcades like Tiger Road, Legendary Wings and Alien vs Predator with Bluetooth multiplayer.

Wow if you want to use your money I recommend you use it for this

Terrible controls.

Wow. I had read some reviews mentioning that the controls aren't great, but I could never have predicted just how truly awful they are. Four different control setups, and not even one that works even remotely well enough to do anything properly - how is it possible to mess up every control scheme so badly? The game should have been called 'Ghouls 'n Ghosts Immobile', given that you can barely move more than a few paces before the controls get you killed. As it is, the game is, without exaggeration, truly unplayable - even on casual mode - until a functional control scheme is added. Perhaps a floating virtual stick would help, or maybe taking cues from some other mobile game controls - there are plenty out there which get it right, after all. I'm really hoping for an update with such an improvement, as the game is otherwise spot on, but as it is, I can't even get past the first stage. Very disappointing.
Great for nostalgic aspect, but the controls make it almost impossible for me

I think it was good but till you fix the lives and the pace I'll only give it 4 stars would like it to be infinite lives and continue not just start over nope I dislike that

Love the game but the controls for moving are horrible.  Would be better as a normal controller dpad shape like in the screenshots but mine is a spaced out up down left right and on tablet it's uncomfortable to use.  Awesome game but can't play well because of this.

I love the ghosts and goblins series and was ecstatic to see the one version I haven't played on here! However, I was dumb and assumed a game of this caliber and difficulty would have Bluetooth controller support and downloaded without checking. Its virtually unplayable without a controller but looks and sounds perfect. Can you tell me if you'll ever add support for a controller? I've tried without and it is more frustrating than the normal frustration one gets just playing a game in this series. Thank you in advance for your response.
If it had Bluetooth controller support I would have given it five stars.

This game blew me away the first few times I played it. It was just like the sega genesis version, but better because it gave the double jump ability.  BUT afyer a few days it stopped working. Went to play the game, just a weird.colored screen. Uninstall/reinstall? Still doesn't work.   Until it works or gets an update, 1 stars

Always been a great classic! I just ran into this whole browsing games & looking it as much as I did when I was 10yo lol, the controls are the only problem IMO. They need an anolog stick option because this is a screen we're playing on & feels wrong when I slide my finger off the 4 direction virtual controls. Give options for full customization of the controls, size & positions... Also a switch weapon button or gesture would be really helpful *if a switch weapon gesture is already there, please show how to* will bring up to 5 starts with controls fixed to be able to be customized! Thanks for the game regardless & no emulator for me if you guys fix the controlsüëçüòâ

One of the best Sega genesis games of all time.  Still play good today
I love the game... However the controls are not pressing everytime i press them. It only happens with the movement control. Maybe a joystick option could help?
A great port of my favorite childhood game any chance of a super ghouls n ghosts and maybe ultimate ghosts n goblins

Probably the best port yet. Ghosts n Goblins was okay but it appears they've slowed it down. Runs like molasses. This port, however, runs at what appears to be very close to the arcade game speed. Controls are kind of hard to master but I think with time you can get it. Might work better with an actual game controller. Overall, pleasantly surprised by this port. Probably their best one. UPDATE: Okay, for some reason, it plays real slow now. It didn't the day I purchased it. What gives? This is running like molasses now. Downgraded to 3 stars now from 4 because of this. Not sure what happened but they need to fix it.
Good port, I hope capcom add achievement and leader boar like ghost n goblins1 :-)

Agree with everyone else.  It's arcade perfect.  Looks and sounds just like classic Ghouls N Ghosts but this game is too fast paced to deal with touch screen navigation. Ducking is separate from moving left and right which is the really achilles heel. The controls just aren't as responsive as they need to be.
